MacroOp.Name: OMNI_DBGEV
MacroOp.Brief: A helper macro used for debug error output.
MacroOp.Description: If debug is enabled in the library, this macro simply expands to a omni::out << string << value << std::endl; while if debug is not enabled, then the value in the macro is not compiled in.
MacroOp.Synopsis: The OMNI_DBGEV helper macro is used within the library to print debug statements.
